name: DARK MINUTE: Kira's Adventure
description:
Will you help Kira to find answers for her questions? Explore the mysterious technology in a thrilling platformer. Face up to hundreds of prepared challenges, discover the terrible secrets of the hero's past and... humanity, and learn a great secret. A game from the creator of two board games.



A single player narrative gameplay in a retro dark tale of exploring an alternative history of humanity and the main character.

  • Over 100 dark levels.
  • After 60 seconds the light turns off...
  • You need to find 3 energy cells to open the exit.
  • How the gameplay will go? Will you discover all secrets? Depends only on you!
  • Discover unknown dungeons, explore underwater mazes and missions!
  • Difficult to obtain rudimentary information about the past of mankind - only for the bravest players.
  • Large and BIG levels!



The controls are extremely simple - you need to jump and dash in the air - but mastering it is quite a challenge. Instant re-spawn allows fast gameplay, revealing secrets and facing the dangers lurking around every corner.

Help Kira explore this dark underworld...
